旼字的基本解释

旼
mín
〔旼旼〕和蔼的样子，如“旼旼穆穆，君子之态。”
古同“旻”。

旼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mín］
［《廣韻》武巾切，平真，明。］
［《集韻》眉貧切，平真，明。］
见“旼旼”。

旼字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　旼； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页490第26
【廣韻】武巾切【集韻】【韻會】眉貧切，?音珉。旼旼，和也。【史記·司馬相如傳】旼旼穆穆，君子之能。【註】徐廣曰：和貌。

旼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
旼字的起名意思

和蔼的样子。

Min
Basic explanation of words
Min
mín
[Min Min] Kind appearance, such as "Min Min Mu Mu, the attitude of a gentleman."
Gu Tong "Min".
Min
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mín］
["Guangyun" Wujin cut, plain and clear. ]
["Jiyun" brows are poor and cut, plain and clear. ]
See "Min Min".
Min
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　旼; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 490 26
[Guangyun] Wujin cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] The eyebrows are poor and cut,? Yin Min. Min Min, and also. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Min Min Mu Mu, the power of a gentleman. [Note] Xu Guang said: and appearance.
